ab_mini.bet-history: select userBets, lobby_id, result from settlement where user_id = ? and operator_id = ? order by created_at desc limit ?

aviator.bet-details: select * from settlement where user_id = ? and operator_id = ? and lobby_id = ?
aviator.bet-history: select * from settlement where user_id = ? and operator_id = ? limit ?

aviator_2_o.lobby-details: select lobby_id, client_seeds, max_mult as round_max_mult, server_seed as serverSeed, hash as hashedSeed, created_at from lobbies where lobby_id = ?
aviator_2_o.bet-details: SELECT s.user_id as user_id, s.operator_id as operator_id, s.lobby_id as lobby_id, s.bet_amount as bet_amount, s.max_mult as max_mult, s.auto_cashout as auto_cashout, s.created_at as created_at, s.status as plane_status, s.win_amount as win_amount, r.max_mult as round_max_mult FROM settlement AS s left JOIN round_stats AS r ON s.lobby_id = r.lobby_id where s.lobby_id = ? and s.operator_id = ? and s.user_id = ?
aviator_2_o.bet-history: SELECT lobby_id, bet_amount, status, max_mult, win_amount, created_at, user_id, avatar  FROM settlement WHERE user_id = ? AND operator_id = ? ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT ?
aviator_2_o.previous-round-history: SELECT s.*, rs.max_mult as round_max_mult from settlement s join round_stats rs on s.lobby_id = rs.lobby_id WHERE rs.lobby_id = (SELECT lobby_id from round_stats ORDER BY id desc LIMIT 1)

jetx.bet-details: SELECT * FROM settlement WHERE user_id = ? AND operator_id = ? AND lobby_id = ?
jetx.bet-history: SELECT * FROM settlement WHERE user_id = ? AND operator_id = ? ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT ?

jetx_v2.lobby-details: select lobby_id, client_seeds, max_mult as round_max_mult, server_seed as serverSeed, hash as hashedSeed, created_at from lobbies where lobby_id = ?
jetx_v2.bet-details: SELECT s.user_id as user_id, s.operator_id as operator_id, s.lobby_id as lobby_id, s.bet_amount as bet_amount, s.max_mult as max_mult, s.auto_cashout as auto_cashout, s.created_at as created_at, s.status as plane_status, s.win_amount as win_amount, r.max_mult as round_max_mult FROM settlement AS s left JOIN round_stats AS r ON s.lobby_id = r.lobby_id where s.lobby_id = ? and s.operator_id = ? and s.user_id = ?
jetx_v2.bet-history: SELECT lobby_id, bet_amount, status, max_mult, win_amount, created_at, user_id, avatar  FROM settlement WHERE user_id = ? AND operator_id = ? ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT ?
jetx_v2.previous-round-history: SELECT s.*, rs.max_mult as round_max_mult from settlement s join round_stats rs on s.lobby_id = rs.lobby_id WHERE rs.lobby_id = (SELECT lobby_id from round_stats ORDER BY id desc LIMIT 1)
jetx_v2.previous-round-mult: SELECT max_mult from round_stats ORDER BY id desc LIMIT 1

pumpedx.bet-history: SELECT * FROM settlement WHERE user_id = ? AND operator_id = ? ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 10

footballx.bet-history: SELECT user_id, max_mult, bet_amount, win_amount, created_at FROM settlement WHERE created_at >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 ?) ORDER BY win_amount DESC LIMIT 10
